channel.title: Free rep+
channel.description:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
i'm setting up a new source, (i've done it before) alot of people 20+ decided to want to use another source, so i've decided to do so. i've got everything set up, new cache, new client, new source. i was able to log on locally but others couldn't come online, i setup a new no-ip but there is several places where it should be changed and i'm not too sure what to do. because this source is way different. if someone could help out that would be great. I'll post my clients "client.java" and if someone could help edit to make it go for a no ip. just show me where i need to put the no-ip by instead of 127.0.0.1 Please let me PM you teamviewer info and i will gladly rep if you can fix. Thank you -------------------------------------------------------------------------------

item.title: Free rep+
item.dc:creator: @sebblol sebblol
item.description:
@sebblol wrote:

if u stilll need help pm me the tv ino and i try to help you

Read full topic

item.description:
@Brandontan wrote:

i’m setting up a new source, (i’ve done it before) alot of people 20+ decided to want to use another source, so i’ve decided to do so. i’ve got everything set up, new cache, new client, new source. i was able to log on locally but others couldn’t come online, i setup a new no-ip but there is several places where it should be changed and i’m not too sure what to do. because this source is way different. if someone could help out that would be great.

Please let me PM you teamviewer info and i will gladly rep if you can fix. Thank you
